descriptionNullable:
### Context

As a beginner in Deep-Learning field, I thought of learning and building something using the data collected by myself. So, I collected the images of *famous Indian fast-food* **VADA-PAV** & the *western fast-food* **BURGER** to build a classifier which classifies between these two similar-looking fast-food.


### Content

This data set contains **686** images of vada-pav and **475** images of the burger.

### Acknowledgements

The technique I used to collect the images is [here](https://forums.fast.ai/t/generating-image-datasets-quickly/19079). 


### Inspiration

This dataset is useful for beginners who want to learn image classification.
title: Vada-pav & Burger
subtitle: Images of Vadapavs & Burgers
